00016         public InSim(InSimSetting _inSimSetting)
00017         {
00018             string errorMessage = "";
00019             if (_inSimSetting.adminPassword.Length > 0x10)
00020             {
00021                 errorMessage += "Administrator Password must be 16 characters long maximun.\r\n";
00022             }
00023             if (_inSimSetting.connectionName.Length > 0x10)
00024             {
00025                 errorMessage += "Connection Name must be 16 characters long maximun.\r\n";
00026             }
00027             if (_inSimSetting.tcpPort < 1024)
00028             {
00029                 errorMessage += "TCP Port number must be > 1024.\r\n";
00030             }
00031             if (_inSimSetting.udpPort != 0 && _inSimSetting.udpPort < 1024)
00032             {
00033                 errorMessage += "UDP Port number must be > 1024.\r\n";
00034             }
00035             if (errorMessage != "")
00036             {
00037                 throw new InvalidConfigurationException(errorMessage + "\r\nVerify you InSimSettings parameters for incorrect values.");
00038             }
00039             inSimSetting = _inSimSetting;
00040             threadSocketReceive = new Thread(new ThreadStart(SocketReceive));
00041             packetStore = new Store();
00042         }
00043         public InSim() { }
00044         protected Store packetStore;
00045         private InSim_Socket_State socketStatus = InSim_Socket_State.INSIM_DISCONNECTED;

00052         private NetworkStream tcpSocket;

00057         public void exit()
00058         {
00059             if (tcpClient.Connected)
00060             {
00061                 packetStore.AddToTcpSendingQueud(new Packet(Protocol_Id.TCP, Packet_Size.TINY_PACKET_SIZE ,Packet_Type.TINY_MULTI_PURPOSE,new PacketTiny(1, Tiny_Type.TINY_CLOSE)));
00062             }
00063             if (udpClient != null)
00064             {
00065                 byte[] dgram = new byte[1];
00066                 udpClient.Send(dgram, 1, "localhost", inSimSetting.udpPort);
00067             }
00068 
00069             socketStatus = InSim_Socket_State.INSIM_DISCONNECTED;
00070 
00071             if(threadSocketReceive.ThreadState == ThreadState.Running)
00072             {
00073                 runThreadSocketReceive = false;
00074                 threadSocketReceive.Join();
00075             }
00076         }
00077         public void connect()
00078         {
00079             runThreadSocketReceive = false;
00080             socketStatus = InSim_Socket_State.INSIM_DISCONNECTED;
00081 
00082             tcpClient = new TcpClient();
00083             try{ tcpClient.Connect(new IPEndPoint(inSimSetting.serverIp, inSimSetting.tcpPort)); }
00084             catch (SocketException _exception){ throw new Exception("TCP Socket Initialization failded, Error was: " +_exception.Message); }
00085             tcpSocket = tcpClient.GetStream();
00086             
00087             PacketISI packetISI = new PacketISI(1, inSimSetting.udpPort, (ushort)inSimSetting.Flags, inSimSetting.CommandPrefix, inSimSetting.MCI_NLP_Interval, inSimSetting.adminPassword, inSimSetting.connectionName);
00088             packetStore.AddToTcpSendingQueud(new Packet(Protocol_Id.TCP, Packet_Size.ISI_PACKET_SIZE, Packet_Type.ISI_INSIM_INITIALISE, packetISI));
00089 
00090             System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);
00091 
00092             udpIpEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, inSimSetting.udpPort);
00093             try { udpClient = new UdpClient(udpIpEndPoint); }
00094             catch (SocketException _exception){ throw new Exception("UDP Socket Initialization failed, Error was: "+_exception.Message); }
00095 
00096             if (tcpClient.Connected)
00097             {
00098                 socketStatus = InSim_Socket_State.INSIM_CONNECTED;
00099                 runThreadSocketReceive = true;
00100 
00101                 if (threadSocketReceive.ThreadState == ThreadState.Unstarted)
00102                 {
00103                     threadSocketReceive.Start();
00104                 }
00105                 else if (this.threadSocketReceive.ThreadState == ThreadState.Stopped)
00106                 {
00107                     this.threadSocketReceive = new Thread(new ThreadStart(SocketReceive));
00108                     this.threadSocketReceive.Start();
00109                 }
00110             }
00111         }
00112         private void SocketReceive()
00113         {
00114             while (runThreadSocketReceive && Program.MainRun)
00115             {
00116                 System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(Program.sleep);
00117                 TcpReceive();
00118                 UdpReceive();
00119                 TcpSend();
00120                 UdpSend();
00121             }
00122         }
00123         private void TcpSend()
00124         {
00125             byte[] _packet = packetStore.NextTcpSendQueud();
00126 
00127             if (_packet == null)
00128                 return;
00129 
00130             Program.Log.debug("TcpSend(), Sending packet: " + (Packet_Type)_packet[1]+"\r\n");
00131             if (!tcpClient.Connected)
00132             {
00133                 Program.Log.debug("TcpSend(), Disconnection Detected...\r\n");
00134                 return;
00135             }
00136             tcpSocket.Write(_packet,0,_packet.Length);
00137         }
00138         private void UdpSend()
00139         {
00140             byte[] _packet = packetStore.NextUdpSendQueud();
00141             if (_packet == null)
00142                 return;
00143 
00144             Program.Log.debug("UdpSend(), Sending packet: " + (Packet_Type)_packet[1] + "\r\n");
00145             udpClient.Send(_packet, _packet.Length);
00146         }
00147         private void TcpReceive()
00148         {
00149             if (!tcpSocket.DataAvailable)
00150                 return;
00151             
00152             byte packetSize;
00153             if ((packetSize = (byte)tcpSocket.ReadByte()) < 3)
00154             {
00155                 Program.Log.debug("TcpReceive(), Droped packet, Too Short!, PacketSize->" + packetSize + "\r\n");
00156                 return;
00157             }
00158 
00159             Packet_Type packetType = (Packet_Type)tcpSocket.ReadByte();
00160 
00161             Program.Log.debug("TcpReceive(), PacketSize->" + packetSize + "\r\n");
00162 
00163             byte[] data = new byte[packetSize-2];
00164             tcpSocket.Read(data, 0, (packetSize-2));
00165             packetStore.AddToTcpReceiveQueud(new Packet(Protocol_Id.TCP,(Packet_Size)packetSize, packetType, data));
00166         }
00167         private void UdpReceive()
00168         {
00169             if (udpClient.Available < 1)
00170                 return;
00171 
00172             byte[] data = new byte[udpClient.Available];
00173             data = udpClient.Receive(ref udpIpEndPoint);
00174             
00175             byte packetSize;
00176             if ((packetSize = data[0]) < 3)
00177             {
00178                 Program.Log.debug("UdpReceive(), Droped packet, Too Short!, PacketSize->" + packetSize + "\r\n");
00179                 return;
00180             }
00181             Program.Log.debug("UdpReceive(), PacketSize->" + packetSize + "\r\n");
00182             packetStore.AddToUdpReceiveQueud(new Packet(Protocol_Id.UDP, data));
00183         }
